author: ETMarkets.com
title: Covid-19 to accentuate growth slowdown, impact on inflation ambiguous: RBI
description: “COVID-19, the accompanying lockdowns and the expected contraction in global output in 2020 weigh heavily on the growth outlook,” the central bank said.
content:
Mumbai/New Delhi: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) on Thursday said while the pandemic coronavirus would impact the economic activity directly and would accentuate the growth slowdown, its impact on inflation is ambiguous.
